precision_cutter.name: Precision Cutter
precision_cutter.desc: Landing a charged shot will knock your opponent down instead of back.

hard_stop.name: Hard Stop
hard_stop.desc: Landing a charged shot will knock your opponent back.

bodkin_arrow.name: Bodkin Arrow
bodkin_arrow.desc: Your charged shots now do extra armor damage to armored enemies and extra damage to unarmored enemies.
